summary: Three distinct body meshes for the three different classes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=5]
One size does not fit all.[/size][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=5] [/size][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3]
While scouring the nexus, I was dissatisfied with the lack of uniqueness and variety of body types available. Most of them fell into a very small category of shapes (you know the ones). So that’s why I decided to create these:


[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][b][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85801-0-1504507620.jpg[/img]

[center][/center][/b][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][b]                 The Warrior                                           [/b][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][b]The Thief                                            [/b][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][b]The Mage 
[/b][/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]


Three separate bodies, based on the UNP body type, each with their own distinct shape, designed to approximate the divergent playstyles of the three character classes. 





  One of my goals with these bodies was not only to create three distinct looks, but also to create a greater contrast between the low weight, and high weight models. That means that, unlike many other mods, these bodies have a [b]dramatically different appearance from 0 to 100[/b]. At low weight, they don’t look too dissimilar from each other, especially with armor. But at high weight, the differences are apparent even from far away. 

  Now you can pick a body to suit your playstyle. The choice is yours. 


[/size][/font]
[b][font=Times New Roman][size=4][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85801-0-1504508128.jpg[/img]
The Warrior[/size][/font][/b][font=Times New Roman][size=3] is built for strength, a body-building tank who thrives in close combat.
[/size][/font][b][font=Times New Roman][size=4]



[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85801-1-1504508128.jpg[/img]
The Thief[/size][/font][/b][font=Times New Roman][size=3] is light and agile, a born sprinter, able to move quickly and step softly.  
[/size][/font][b][font=Times New Roman][size=4]



[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85801-0-1504537459.jpg[/img]
The Mage[/size][/font][/b][font=Times New Roman][size=3] is delicate and shapely, and employs magic to avoid long roads and heavy lifting. 
 



 


[u]Note:
[/u] - These are the [/size][/font][u][font=Times New Roman][size=3]body meshes only[/size][/font][/u][font=Times New Roman][size=3]. All three of these bodies are based on the UUNP body type. They are UUNP Special, and support HDT
physics. 
 - None of the textures are mine. You will need to download them separately. The textures I use are primarily the Mature skin as well as the normal mapping from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniac[/url]. 
                                                                                        
[u]Requirements:
[/u]Any UUNP textures.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide[/url] (only if you use the presets)

 
[u]Recommendations:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81201/]Racial Body Morphs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56093]Realistic Body System Remade[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51612]Every Body's Different Redone[/url]
 [/size][/font]
author: Fat Carrington
